# unhide(_:)

**Instance Method**

Restores hidden windows to the screen and makes the receiver active.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func unhide(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The object that sent the command.

## Discussion

Invokes [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/unhideWithoutActivation()].

## Related Documentation

- **activate(ignoringOtherApps:)**: Makes the receiver the active app.

## Hiding Windows

- **isHidden**: A Boolean value indicating whether the app is hidden.
- **hide(_:)**: Hides all the receiver’s windows, and the next app in line is activated.
- **unhideWithoutActivation()**: Restores hidden windows without activating their owner (the receiver).
